info.title: Giellatekno/Divvun/UiT fst-based speller for Khakas
info.description: This is an fst-based speller for Khakas. It is based on the normative subset of the morphological analyser for Khakas. The source code can be found at: https://victorio.uit.no/langtech/trunk/langs/kjh/ License: GPL3+.

acceptor.title: Giellatekno/Divvun/UiT dictionary Khakas
acceptor.description: Giellatekno/Divvun/UiT dictionary for Khakas compiled for HFST.

errmodel.title: Levenshtein edit distance transducer
errmodel.description: Correction model for keyboard misstrokes, at most 2 per word.
